mapper.insert:
insert into exam_timetable (id, name, room_name, course_name, term_order, term_year, exam_date, start_time, end_time, day, school_week, gmt_create, gmt_modify) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.termOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.termYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.examDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.schoolWeek,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

distinct

order by ${orderByClause}
